name: The Royal Ball With A Side Of Snacks Or Drinks
name_original: The Royal Ball With A Side Of Snacks Or Drinks
description:
A comedic text based role playing adventure game, that consists of three stories.

The Royal Ball is about the assassination of a king, but not everything goes according to plan. 

Snacks or Drinks - ”Wine or Cheese?” and ”Chocolate or Cider?” These are but two of many choices you will be faced with in these absurd collections of strange scenarios. Every choice has a consequence, but not always in the way you would expect.
